name: NSStoryboard
desc: An encapsulation of the design-time view controller and window controller graph represented in an Interface Builder storyboard resource file.

items.name: init(name: NSStoryboard.Name, bundle: Bundle?)
items.desc: Creates a storyboard based on the named storyboard file in the specified bundle.

items.name: typealias NSStoryboard.Name
items.desc: The name of the storyboard file.

items.name: func instantiateInitialController() -> Any?
items.desc: Creates the initial view controller or window controller from a storyboard.

items.name: func instantiateInitialController<Controller>(creator: ((NSCoder) -> Controller?)?) -> Controller?
items.desc: Creates the initial view controller from the storyboard and initializes it using your custom code.

items.name: func instantiateInitialController<Controller>(creator: ((NSCoder) -> Controller?)?) -> Controller?
items.desc: Creates the initial window controller from the storyboard and initializes it using your custom code.

items.name: func instantiateController(withIdentifier: NSStoryboard.SceneIdentifier) -> Any
items.desc: Instantiates a specified view controller or window controller from a storyboard.

items.name: func instantiateController<Controller>(identifier: NSStoryboard.SceneIdentifier, creator: ((NSCoder) -> Controller?)?) -> Controller
items.desc: Creates the specified view controller from the storyboard and initializes it using your custom initialization code.

items.name: func instantiateController<Controller>(identifier: NSStoryboard.SceneIdentifier, creator: ((NSCoder) -> Controller?)?) -> Controller
items.desc: Creates the specified window controller from the storyboard and initializes it using your custom initialization code.

items.name: typealias NSStoryboard.SceneIdentifier
items.desc: A string that uniquely identifies a view controller or window controller in your storyboard file.
